name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 15, Guangdong. A woman posted a video on Douyin about a customer stabbing a foot massage lady with a knife. She then received calls from three relevant departments asking her to delete the video. But she still didn’t delete it. A few minutes later, several police officers came to her house and asked her to delete the video. They also threatened her family and said that if the situation was serious, they would file a case for investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A record of a meeting between Jiyue and the car owners was circulated online.
According to the publisher, many people in the car owner group have received calls from the police station and were asked to sign a guarantee.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 16, a man described the ridiculous experience of being beaten by the police after being forced into his house by five or six "cops" with guns just because he forwarded an article about a suicide incident.

Some netizens in the comment area also said they had the same experience: "The house was unfinished, and the group planned to defend their rights. That night, the group owner was invited to have tea."

"When the epidemic was over, I sent a message to the city government to ask for my salary in the group, and then the group disappeared, and the police called me."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Reported on December 16, Qingyang, Gansu. A teacher played mahjong with a friend ten years ago, and the rules were "Peace 5 yuan" and "Bomb 10 yuan" and was fined 500 yuan by the police.
In 2014, he played mahjong with a friend again and was fined 300 yuan. In 2023, the Education Bureau gave him a demerit for playing mahjong ten years ago.
Netizens replied "Why don't you investigate 500 years back?" "Civil servants play bigger, okay?" "Why don't you investigate the secretary and the principal, but a teacher?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the French government fell, Germany also fell. On December 16, German Chancellor Scholz's confidence vote was not passed in the Bundestag. Scholz could no longer stay in the position of Chancellor, the traffic light government was officially disintegrated, and Germany will hold early general elections. Currently, the new election of the German Bundestag is scheduled to be held on February 23, 2025.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: People's Daily Commentary: Deep-sea fishing is a violation of the rule of law, and the black hand behind illegal enforcement of deep-sea fishing regulations must be cut off.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 16, a fire broke out on Jianghan Road Pedestrian Street in Wuhan, Hubei. The fire truck was blocked outside and the firefighters walked into the fire scene. According to eyewitnesses, "The smoke started to rise around 12 noon. The community had evacuated the surrounding residents. As of 14:00, the fire had not been extinguished." The video circulated online showed that the fire truck was blocked outside the pedestrian street by the isolation stone pier, and the firefighters could only walk into the fire scene with their equipment. The accident caused 1 death

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 16th, Sichuan Zigong 3 people were arrested for soaking tripe in formaldehyde in a rental house
In order to process the tripe and ensure its "freshness", the three people thawed and cooked the tripe and soaked it in caustic soda, and added formaldehyde to preserve it when selling it. The three people sold tripe for more than 2 million yuan in total, and the tripe products involved had already flowed into the vegetable market for sale.
At present, the three people have been arrested by the police and transferred for prosecution.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 16, the Peace Hotel in Shanghai launched a 298 yuan group purchase package, which was criticized for spending money to buy inferiority. 
Recently, a netizen posted a video to complain about the 298 yuan group purchase package launched by the Peace Hotel in Shanghai on a group purchase platform. The netizen said that the package actually includes a glass of water and a piece of bread, and it is not allowed to be eaten on site, and must be packed away. The group purchase shows that the original price of the package is 694, and the price is 298 after a 4.3% discount. 
The package includes a visit to the Peace Hotel Museum, lobby, restaurant and other public areas, which is worth 0.01 yuan; you can also choose one of the two projects worth 298 yuan: 
1. Jazz Tour: a cocktail and jazz appreciation; 
2. Food and leisure tour: a piece of cake and a cup of coffee to take away. 
The purchase interface shows that more than 50 people have purchased the package.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 16, the famous ocean-going cargo ship captain, Bilibili Up master Captain Seaman, posted a post complaining that his attempt to submit a video about installing and testing Starlink on an ocean-going cargo ship on Bilibili was blocked, with the reason being: "According to the Cybersecurity Law and other relevant laws, regulations and policies, this video will not be reviewed and approved." Captain Seaman's impression of Bilibili as open and fair was shattered

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 5th, Hanzhong, Shaanxi A blogger posted a video accusing the traffic police of setting up cones and checking for highway violations. There were many tire marks of sudden braking in front of the cones. The blogger questioned that this method of highway interception was dangerous and violated the Road Traffic Law, and was suspected of abusing his power. After the video was released, the Shaanxi traffic police went to Hefei to find the blogger, saying that the fine could be negotiated, and asked the blogger to provide two adult ID cards. They changed the speeding to not wearing a seat belt, and no points were deducted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 16, Guangzhou. An ambulance was blocked at an intersection by illegally parked vehicles and sanitation vehicles. Even as the ambulance kept honking, the workers on the garbage truck remained indifferent and continued to process the garbage cans at a leisurely pace.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Because so many people asked what happened in Yuxi, the Yuxi radio station closed the comment section.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Since the situation in Yuxi was strictly blocked, netizens could only vaguely express what happened in Yuxi:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 16 Shenzhen Due to the landslide on December 5, residents of Jiuwei Community in Bao'an District had to take a detour of more than two hours to travel a 20-minute route. They finally began issuing access permits to residents yesterday, allowing them to travel by electric bike with the permit. Because there were too many people who needed permits, many people waited in line until the evening to get the permits, and the queues lasted more than two or three hours.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 8, the originator of the term "malicious wage demand" and NPC deputy Li Baozhong was included in the list of dishonest executors! The total amount of money executed was only 480,000 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Doing life-threatening work and getting the cheapest salary
Some netizens discovered that Guan Tianfeng, a hacker who was offered a $10 million bounty by the United States, had a labor dispute with Sichuan Wusheng Information Technology Co., Ltd. in July 2020. Guan Tianfeng sued Wusheng Information Company and then voluntarily withdrew the lawsuit. The court ruled that Guan Tianfeng should bear the litigation fee of 5 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 15th, Yiwu, Zhejiang Province: An SUV suddenly rushed out of the underground garage at full speed, crashing into everything along the way, including the parking pole, causing serious damage to many vehicles and people falling to the ground. The traffic police said: The injured were all sent to the hospital for treatment, and the underground garage has now resumed normal operations.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Doing life-threatening work and getting the cheapest salary
Some netizens discovered that Guan Tianfeng, a hacker who was offered a $10 million bounty by the United States, had a labor dispute with Sichuan Wusheng Information Technology Co., Ltd. in July 2020. Guan Tianfeng sued Wusheng Information Company and then voluntarily withdrew the lawsuit. The court ruled that Guan Tianfeng should bear the litigation fee of 5 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The school responded that this is a free meal reward for the monthly exam, and it is not like this at other times.
These meals are rewards for the first place in a single subject, the first place in the grade or class, and the first place in improvement in the monthly exam. The school will give a free cultural and creative product and a free special meal.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of December 16, residents of Wenjiang, Chengdu, Sichuan gathered to protest against the construction of a funeral project near a water resource protection area and residential area.
On the 14th, the government had issued a notice: "The funeral project should be stopped immediately and the site selection should be re-examined." However, the project was still under construction, and residents who found themselves deceived gathered to protest.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In order to prevent the crematorium from continuing its secret construction, local residents took turns to guard the construction site 24 hours a day to stop the construction.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Laughing at something funny is also a sin
December 13 Shanghai A blogger posted that his daughter was studying at a key middle school in Yangpu District. When she was doing indoor radio gymnastics, the characters in the video played were deformed, causing the students to burst into laughter. The laughter spread to other classes. After the head teacher found out, he asked the whole class to write a reflection, which must not be less than 500 words
The blogger believes: Laughter is the most beautiful language of human beings. How perverted is it to not allow people to laugh?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Putian-affiliated hospitals reappeared. A 76-year-old man was taken to Putian Ping An Hospital for "free" surgery. Family members questioned that the hospital did not notify the family members of the surgery and that there was "insurance fraud"
Mr. Ke said that his 76-year-old mother was secretly sent to a private hospital for surgery. Later, she fainted at home. Family members believed that the surgery was not agreed by the family members and there was a suspicion of hedging
The hospital said that they were only responsible for receiving patients, and how the elderly came had nothing to do with them
But the family members found that many elderly people were sent to the hospital by "special cars"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 16, a Weibo blogger questioned the Islamic decorations on the wall of a Lanzhou ramen restaurant opposite Hefei University of Technology, and @Hefei released the official account to ask the authorities to deal with this behavior. The blogger also posted a Weibo on the 16th, alluding to the issue of Hui people in Yuxi, saying: Salute to the comrades fighting in the southwest border of the motherland, make up your mind, fear no sacrifice, overcome all difficulties, and strive for victory. Govern the prominent Islamic issues according to law and remove the hardest nails.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the Chinese authorities announced that the individual pension system would soon be implemented nationwide, some netizens recently reported on social media that Industrial Bank had privately opened individual pension accounts for users without their knowledge.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 17th, Wenzhou, Zhejiang Province, many media outlets reported that a mother in her early 30s was already a mother of 9 children. The mother, born in 1992, said that she "wanted to give birth to 12 zodiac signs". The person concerned said: "You should have more children while you are young. Money does not necessarily increase as you earn more. The key is to have successors. All material things will eventually belong to others, but the children are yours." However, some netizens dug out that her husband is the chairman of Wanzheng Group, with total assets of 2.9 billion. Netizens joked: His toilet is bigger than my house.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 16, Reference News: British media: China has many "trump cards" in hand
"China is catching up with the United States at an alarming speed"
December 17, Reference News: China has many trump cards in hand and can send different messages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to a report on December 16, the Chairman of the Financial Market Committee of the Russian State Duma supports the promotion of the food voucher system throughout Russia.
It is reported that as of December 9, Russia's annual inflation rate reached 9.2%, the highest level since February 2023.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 7, the National Immigration Administration issued an announcement to comprehensively relax and optimize the transit visa-free policy from now on, extending the stay period of foreigners with transit visa-free status from the original 72 hours and 144 hours to 240 hours (10 days). At the same time, 21 new ports were added as exit ports for transit visa-free personnel.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a woman said that she was cheated on by her boyfriend and was forcibly sent to a mental hospital for defending her rights. On December 17, the woman posted again, saying that the man's grandfather was a general, his mother was the vice president of a state-owned enterprise, and his father was the director of a tertiary hospital. And the man lived in the most central area of Zhujiang New Town.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 16, CCTV reported: The State Council Information Office Statistics Bureau summarized the current economic situation in 15 words, that is, "production increased, demand increased, employment stable, market warm, quality excellent", which caused netizens to mock.
Netizens replied "It's really funny" "It's crazy again, it's stable every year, but the unemployment rate is high, and none of the problems such as education and medical care can be solved"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 17, the National Immigration Administration issued an announcement to comprehensively relax and optimize the transit visa-free policy from now on, extending the stay period of foreigners with transit visa-free status from the original 72 hours and 144 hours to 240 hours (10 days). At the same time, 21 new ports were added as exit ports for transit visa-free personnel.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 16, Premier Li Qiang convened a State Council meeting and pointed out that it was necessary to study and promote the development of football.
Netizens responded, "In their eyes, is football more important than people's livelihood?" "If you have money, solve the employment of college students first."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
China's top box office movies over the years
The chart shows that starting from 2017, the style of the top box office movies changed dramatically.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 17, it was reported that Igor Kirillov, commander of the Russian Defense Forces, was killed in an explosion near a residential building in southeastern Moscow, and Ukraine later claimed responsibility.
Currently, the Baidu Encyclopedia entry page for "Igor Kirillov" has been set to black and white.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It is reported that Xi Jinping will go to Macau to attend the celebration of the 25th anniversary of Macau's return to China.
On December 17, according to Zhuhai netizens, the entire Zhuhai, especially Hengqin Island, is on high alert. Traffic police and armed police can be seen everywhere on the road. Some sections of the road are blocked with iron sheets. There are also speedboats patrolling on the sea. Anyone who takes photos will be immediately persuaded to leave.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the morning of the 17th, Li Jianping, former secretary of the Party Working Committee of Hohhot Economic Development Zone, was executed.
It was reported that Li Jianping was involved in a case of more than 3 billion yuan.
And 3 billion is the annual GDP of some counties in the west, and the result of the hard work of the people of the county for a year. Li Jianping's hometown, Bazhou City, had a fiscal revenue of more than 2.9 billion yuan last year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 16, the National Bureau of Statistics reported that in November, the average weekly working hours of employees in enterprises nationwide was 48.9 hours; the national urban unemployment rate in November was 5.0%, which aroused doubts among netizens. Many netizens said that their weekly working hours have far exceeded the data released by the Statistics Bureau: "I work 71 hours a week" "I work 320 hours a month"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 12, a blogger revealed that a woman suspected to be named Wang Shilan, 52 years old, from Guizhou, has lived in a village in Xinzhou for at least 18 years, and her living conditions are very poor.
According to the information, the woman had been sold to several families, but because the woman was mentally ill and could not tell the specific location of her hometown, her family has not been found yet.
Zhu Yutang, a volunteer for finding relatives, once posted this incident on social media, but the video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 17, a technology company called "Xingbaibang" published a statement saying that compared with the traditional iOS system evidence collection method, Xingbaibang's iOS device file extraction method supports the latest iPhone models and the latest system versions. And when the phone is not connected to the Internet, law enforcement officers can still carry out data extraction of the entire file system. The extraction process is safe and reliable, and the deleted data can be recovered to the greatest extent.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, the Weibo topic is banned

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 17, sanitation workers in Lintong District, Xi'an, went to the government gate to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Qinzhou, Guangxi recently launched a "knocking on the door" campaign, where staff will go door to door and force residents to download anti-fraud apps.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 16 (Released) A political teacher told students about the Russian-Ukrainian war: Russia attacked Ukraine because Russia and Ukraine "divorced" more than 20 years ago, and when they "divorced", Russia was very honest and helped Ukraine pay off its debts. But Ukraine was "unfaithful" and quickly established relations with the United States and European countries, and then the United States instigated Ukraine to attack Russia...

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 17, workers at the Xi'an City Wall demanded their wages outside the Qujiang New District Management Committee.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Reported on December 16, Guangdong. A girl worked 12 different jobs in one month, earning nearly 10,000 yuan a month. This caused ridicule and dissatisfaction among netizens.
Netizens responded, "The average monthly salary for one job is less than 900 yuan, the ecological environment is too bad!" "What is there to praise about this?" "The fundamental reason is why she needs to work 12 jobs? Doesn't it prove that one job can no longer support a family?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 17, a concerned citizen called the Nanchang police to inquire about Li Yixue's current situation (the video has been deleted at present)
The police officer said, "According to our understanding, (Li Yixue) has not been summoned to the public security organ. Her family has not called the police either. We don't know whether the video she posted is true or false. Please pay attention to the notice."
On December 17, the official notice: "Li Yixue's missing" news is false, and she has been at home.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The video shows that in order to destroy the evidence of North Korean soldiers appearing on the battlefield, Russia actually burned the faces of the dead North Korean soldiers.
Zelensky posted a video on the X platform saying, "Russia not only sent North Korean soldiers to participate in the war, but also tried to cover up the existence of North Korean soldiers and prohibited North Korean soldiers from showing their faces during training. This is a manifestation of disrespect for people and is very common in Russia."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 10, in Dengzhou, Henan, homeowners of Huazhou Lanxiu Community gathered in front of the government to demand the handover of their houses. It is understood that the community has been unfinished for nearly ten years.
